mapper.select: SELECT A.menu_id AS menu_id1, A.parent_id AS parent_id1, A.menu_name AS menu_name1, A.icon AS icon1, A.url AS url1, B.menu_id AS menu_id2, B.menu_name AS menu_name2, B.url AS url2, B.icon AS icon2 FROM (SELECT * FROM `t_menu` WHERE parent_id=0) AS A INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM `t_menu` WHERE parent_id in (SELECT menu_id FROM `t_menu` WHERE parent_id=0)) AS B ON A.menu_id=B.parent_id AND B.level <= #{level} ORDER BY A.menu_id,B.menu_id;
